snippet.title: The Catapult VR
snippet.description:
Available soon on the Oculus Store:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5570330959688310/

The Catapult VR

Use the slingshot, ballista or cannon to throw stones at the opponents and break their military mechanisms and siege towers.

The game has a simple intuitive control. Pull and throw a projectile at the enemy to charge the slingshot and select the tension force. Release to launch the projectile into the enemy.

For each struck enemy you will earn coins which help you to upgrades a weapon, turret or your equipment.

We are waiting for your wishes and comments on the game.

Have a good game!
